titleStmt.title: A Request presented to the King of Spayn and the Lordes of the Counsel of the State by the inhabitantes of the Louue Countreyes protesting that they will liue according to the reformation of the Gospell, the xxij. of Iune. 1578.
titleStmt.author: Philip II, King of Spain, 1527-1598.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the St. John's College (University of Cambridge). Library.
